scripts.rebuild: npm run -s delete-db && npm run -s apply-schema && npm run -s prisma-client
scripts.migrate: npm run -s delete-migrations && npm run -s delete-db && npm run -s migrate-schema && npm run -s prisma-client
scripts.apply-schema: echo '🔁 Applying exisitng schema...' && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate-schema: echo '📦 Migrating new schema...' && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.prisma-client: echo '⚙️ Generating Prisma client...' && npx prisma generate
